channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游 08:08 Attention! Dronov-Kamikadze attack
item.description: 游 08:08 Attention! Dronov-Kamikadze attack This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
